ComicInfo.Title: Heroes and Villains
ComicInfo.Summary: Heroes and Villains: The Justice Machine chase after the rebel Maxinor and his son Robert on their home planet Georwell. Maxinor and Youthquake escape to Earth using a dimensional lock similar to the one used by the Elementals. Zarren wants to send the Machine after Maxinor and gives them seven hours to take care of any personal business. The Machine journey to Earth and capture Maxinor, but when they send a retrieval signal, they find that Zarren has accused the Machine of treason, and of being in league with the rebels of Georwell.
